books.author: by Robert Galbraith
books.description: The struggling detective Cormoran Strike investigates a supermodel’s suicide; by J.K. Rowling, writing pseudonymously.
books.name: THE CUCKOO'S CALLING

books.author: by Debbie Macomber
books.description: The second book of the Inn at Rose Harbor series continues the story of Jo Marie Rose and her bed-and-breakfast in Cedar Cove.
books.name: ROSE HARBOR IN BLOOM

books.author: by James Patterson and David Ellis
books.description: When he begins to investigate a friend’s mysterious death, a man discovers that she was leading a double life.
books.name: MISTRESS

books.author: by Liane Moriarty
books.description: A woman’s life is upended when she discovers a letter from her husband she was not meant to read.
books.name: THE HUSBAND'S SECRET

books.author: by Lee Child
books.description: With New York City blacked out, a 16-year-old Jack Reacher helps a woman with a problem; a Jack Reacher novella.
books.name: HIGH HEAT

books.author: by Lene Kaaberbol
books.description: A nurse makes a shocking discovery: a naked and drugged boy hidden in a locker at the Copenhagen train station.
books.name: THE BOY IN THE SUITCASE

books.author: by Hugh Howey
books.description: The conclusion to the Silo Saga, a series about survival in a dystopian world that began with "Wool."
books.name: DUST

books.author: by Sylvia Day
books.description: Gianna re-encounters her old flame Jackson in the first installment of a new miniseries.
books.name: AFTERBURN

books.author: by Dan Brown
books.description: The symbologist Robert Langdon, on the run in Florence, must decipher a series of codes created by a Dante-loving scientist.
books.name: INFERNO

books.author: by A. S. A. Harrison
books.description: A chilling portrait of a marriage gone terribly awry is presented in alternating voices.
books.name: THE SILENT WIFE

books.author: by Khaled Hosseini
books.description: A multigenerational family saga centers on a brother and sister born in Afghanistan; by the author of "The Kite Runner."
books.name: AND THE MOUNTAINS ECHOED

books.author: by Maya Banks
books.description: Three wealthy men explore dominance and desire.
books.name: BURN

books.author: by Orson Scott Card
books.description: Government agencies breed child geniuses and train them as soldiers. Originally published in 1985.
books.name: ENDER'S GAME

books.author: by Gillian Flynn
books.description: A woman disappears on the day of her fifth anniversary; is her husband a killer?
books.name: GONE GIRL

books.author: by Daniel Silva
books.description: Gabriel Allon, an art restorer and occasional spy for the Israeli secret service, steps in to help the British prime minister, whose lover has been kidnapped.
books.name: THE ENGLISH GIRL
